data:
kind: AdaptiveDialog
beginDialog:
  kind: OnRecognizedIntent
  id: main
  condition: =!IsEmpty(Global.PA_Copilot_Model_NavigationContext) && CountRows(Global.PA_Copilot_Model_NavigationContext) > 1
  intent:
    displayName: Questions about navigation in the application
    triggerQueries:
      - Navigate to
      - Navigate

  actions:
    - kind: Question
      id: question_ib8Gj4
      interruptionPolicy:
        allowInterruption: true

      variable: init:Topic.SelectedTarget
      prompt: " What area of the application do you want to navigate to? "
      entity:
        kind: DynamicClosedListEntity
        items: =Global.PA_Copilot_Model_NavigationContext

    - kind: SendActivity
      id: sendActivity_bLkRho
      activity: We navigated you to the {Topic.SelectedTarget.DisplayName} page

    - kind: SendActivity
      id: sendActivity_A5ha6O
      activity:
        kind: EventActivity
        value: "=Concatenate(\"{\"\"Entity\"\": \"\"\",Topic.SelectedTarget.TargetEntity, \"\"\"}\")"
        name: MS.PA.Navigation
name: Model App Navigation Skill

data:
kind: AdaptiveDialog
beginDialog:
  kind: OnEventActivity
  id: main
  eventName: Microsoft.PowerApps.Copilot.GenerateChartCard

  actions:
    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_mnO8IW
      variable: Topic.encodedFetchXML
      value: =Text(System.Activity.Value.encodedFetchXML)

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_1NM17O
      variable: Topic.dvEntity
      value: =Text(System.Activity.Value.dvEntitySetName)

    - kind: ConditionGroup
      id: conditionGroup_nwnCNh
      conditions:
        - id: conditionItem_59Hplg
          condition: =!IsBlank(Topic.dvEntity) && !IsBlank(Topic.encodedFetchXML)

      elseActions:
        - kind: SendActivity
          id: sendActivity_gsKBBM
          activity:
            kind: EventActivity
            value: =Concatenate("Either FetchXML or DV entity set name is empty", "FetchXML:", Topic.encodedFetchXML, "DV Entity set name:", Topic.dvEntity)
            name: MS.PA.GenerateChartCard

        - kind: LogCustomTelemetryEvent
          id: YOFfRj
          eventName: GenerateChartCard.PageContextError
          properties: =Concatenate("Either FetchXML or DV entity set name is empty", "FetchXML:", Topic.encodedFetchXML, "DV Entity set name:", Topic.dvEntity)

        - kind: EndDialog
          id: r4FRHW

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_IHTYas
      variable: Topic.correlationId
      value: =If(!IsBlank(System.Activity.ChannelData.correlationId), Text(System.Activity.ChannelData.correlationId), Text(GUID()))

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_CAdKNQ
      variable: Topic.clientRequestId
      value: =If(!IsBlank(System.Activity.ChannelData.clientRequestId), Text(System.Activity.ChannelData.clientRequestId), Text(GUID()))

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_Hs8YaN
      variable: Topic.clientSessionId
      value: =If(!IsBlank(System.Activity.ChannelData.clientSessionId), Text(System.Activity.ChannelData.clientSessionId), Text(GUID()))

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_n8I370
      variable: Topic.requestFetchXMLToTSql
      value: =Concatenate("https://dataverse/api/data/v9.2/FetchXMLToSQL(FetchXml=@p1)?@p1=", "%27", Topic.encodedFetchXML, "%27")

    - kind: HttpRequestAction
      id: oG7rXI
      method: Get
      url: =Topic.requestFetchXMLToTSql
      headers:
        X-Ms-Client-Request-Id: =Topic.clientRequestId
        X-Ms-Client-Session-Id: =Topic.clientSessionId
        X-Ms-Correlation-Id: =Topic.correlationId

      errorHandling:
        kind: ContinueOnErrorBehavior
        statusCode: Topic.callStatusCode
        errorResponseBody: Topic.callError

      response: Topic.FetchXMLToSqlResponse
      responseSchema: Any

    - kind: ConditionGroup
      id: conditionGroup_EmmEE3
      conditions:
        - id: conditionItem_doLuyS
          condition: =!IsBlank(Topic.FetchXMLToSqlResponse)

      elseActions:
        - kind: LogCustomTelemetryEvent
          id: e82kEb
          eventName: GenerateChartCard.DataverseFetcXMLToSQLError
          properties: =Concatenate("Error converting fetchXML to SQL", "Error Code:", Topic.callStatusCode, "ErrorResponse", Topic.callError)

        - kind: EndDialog
          id: fxkEEx

    - kind: ParseValue
      id: vrgaIZ
      variable: Topic.ParsedFetchXMLToSQLResponse
      valueType:
        kind: Record
        properties:
          Response: String

      value: =Topic.FetchXMLToSqlResponse

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_ebKYcT
      variable: Topic.TSql
      value: =Topic.ParsedFetchXMLToSQLResponse.Response

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_Y8nb6o
      variable: Topic.RequestSampleData
      value: =Concatenate("https://dataverse/api/data/v9.2/",Topic.dvEntity,"?fetchXml=", Topic.encodedFetchXML)

    - kind: HttpRequestAction
      id: 3AbFhu
      url: =Topic.RequestSampleData
      headers:
        X-Ms-Client-Request-Id: =Topic.clientRequestId
        X-Ms-Client-Session-Id: =Topic.clientSessionId
        X-Ms-Correlation-Id: =Topic.correlationId

      errorHandling:
        kind: ContinueOnErrorBehavior
        statusCode: Topic.callStatusCode
        errorResponseBody: Topic.callError

      response: Topic.sampleDataResponse
      responseSchema: Any

    - kind: ConditionGroup
      id: conditionGroup_fMIcQu
      conditions:
        - id: conditionItem_Gbjeap
          condition: =!IsBlank(Topic.sampleDataResponse)

      elseActions:
        - kind: SendActivity
          id: sendActivity_wLF9IO
          activity:
            kind: EventActivity
            value: =Concatenate("Error getting sample data", "Error Code:", Topic.callStatusCode, "ErrorResponse", Topic.callError)
            name: MS.PA.GenerateChartCard

        - kind: LogCustomTelemetryEvent
          id: wMHa2k
          eventName: GenerateChartCard.DataverseSampleDataError
          properties: =Concatenate("Error getting sample data", "Error Code:", Topic.callStatusCode, "ErrorResponse", Topic.callError)

        - kind: EndDialog
          id: dglH2e

    - kind: HttpRequestAction
      id: 5oO0lS
      method: Post
      url: https://ppapi.env/cards/generate/template?api-version=2022-03-01-preview
      headers:
        Content-Type: application/json
        X-Ms-Client-Request-Id: =Topic.clientRequestId
        X-Ms-Client-Session-Id: =Topic.clientSessionId
        X-Ms-Correlation-Id: =Topic.correlationId

      body:
        kind: JsonRequestContent
        content:
          kind: ValueExpression
          literalValue:
            cardType: chart

      errorHandling:
        kind: ContinueOnErrorBehavior
        statusCode: Topic.callStatusCode
        errorResponseBody: Topic.callError

      response: Topic.supportedChartTypeSchemaResponse
      responseSchema: Any

    - kind: ConditionGroup
      id: conditionGroup_1Z8Wiu
      conditions:
        - id: conditionItem_vkattU
          condition: =!IsBlank(Topic.supportedChartTypeSchemaResponse)

      elseActions:
        - kind: SendActivity
          id: sendActivity_gaxjDX
          activity:
            kind: EventActivity
            value: =Concatenate("Error getting chart templates", "Error Code:", Topic.callStatusCode, "ErrorResponse", Topic.callError)
            name: MS.PA.GenerateChartCard

        - kind: LogCustomTelemetryEvent
          id: 1QAh9i
          eventName: GenerateChartCard.PowerCardServiceError
          properties: =Concatenate("Error getting chart templates", "Error Code:", Topic.callStatusCode, "ErrorResponse", Topic.callError)

        - kind: EndDialog
          id: 2u2ayB

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_W8oTYA
      variable: Topic.requestBody
      value: |-
        ={
            supportedChartTypeSchemas: Topic.supportedChartTypeSchemaResponse,
            tSQl: Topic.TSql,
            sampleData: Topic.sampleDataResponse
        }

    - kind: HttpRequestAction
      id: ZzADc6
      method: Post
      url: https://ppapi.env/intelligenceservice/GenerateChartQuery?api-version=2022-03-01-preview
      headers:
        Content-Type: application/json
        X-Ms-Client-Request-Id: =Topic.clientRequestId
        X-Ms-Client-Session-Id: =Topic.clientSessionId
        X-Ms-Correlation-Id: =Topic.correlationId

      body:
        kind: JsonRequestContent
        content: =Topic.requestBody

      errorHandling:
        kind: ContinueOnErrorBehavior
        statusCode: Topic.callStatusCode
        errorResponseBody: Topic.callError

      requestTimeoutInMilliseconds: 120000
      response: Topic.GenerateChartQueryResponse
      responseSchema: Any

    - kind: ConditionGroup
      id: conditionGroup_EVlGsm
      conditions:
        - id: conditionItem_V8M0bw
          condition: =!IsBlank(Topic.GenerateChartQueryResponse)

      elseActions:
        - kind: SendActivity
          id: sendActivity_xp53mq
          activity:
            kind: EventActivity
            value: =Concatenate("Failed to get successful response from Intelligence service.", "Error Code:", Topic.callStatusCode, "ErrorResponse", Topic.callError)
            name: MS.PA.GenerateChartCard

        - kind: LogCustomTelemetryEvent
          id: wDxmjL
          eventName: GenerateChartCard.IntelligenceServiceError
          properties: =Concatenate("Failed to get successful response from Intelligence service.", "Error Code:", Topic.callStatusCode, "ErrorResponse", Topic.callError)

        - kind: EndDialog
          id: NeZU8z

    - kind: HttpRequestAction
      id: RQZBlC
      method: Post
      url: https://ppapi.env/cards/generate/card?api-version=2022-03-01-preview
      headers:
        Content-Type: application/json
        X-Ms-Client-Request-Id: =Topic.clientRequestId
        X-Ms-Client-Session-Id: =Topic.clientSessionId
        X-Ms-Correlation-Id: =Topic.correlationId

      body:
        kind: JsonRequestContent
        content: =Topic.GenerateChartQueryResponse

      errorHandling:
        kind: ContinueOnErrorBehavior
        statusCode: Topic.callStatusCode
        errorResponseBody: Topic.callError

      response: Topic.GenerateChartCardResponse
      responseSchema: Any

    - kind: LogCustomTelemetryEvent
      id: QNcPLg
      eventName: GenerateChartCard CorrelationId
      properties: =Topic.correlationId

    - kind: LogCustomTelemetryEvent
      id: GxNIAb
      eventName: GenerateChartCard ClientSessionId
      properties: =Topic.clientSessionId

    - kind: LogCustomTelemetryEvent
      id: dBS2RZ
      eventName: GenerateChartCard ClientRequestId
      properties: =Topic.clientRequestId

    - kind: SendActivity
      id: sendActivity_5Fm4fI
      activity:
        kind: EventActivity
        value: =Topic.GenerateChartCardResponse
        name: MS.PA.GenerateChartCard
name: Generate Chart Card

name: محتوى النظام الأساسي الافتراضي Sparks (ar-SA)

data:
kind: AdaptiveDialog
beginDialog:
  kind: OnEventActivity
  id: main
  priority: 99
  eventName: Microsoft.PowerApps.Copilot.RequestZeroPrompt
  actions:
    - kind: SetTextVariable
      id: setTextVariable_VlokaN
      variable: Topic.PlatformZPEHowMany
      value: How many **[table name]** are there?

    - kind: SetTextVariable
      id: setTextVariable_uV3wX4
      variable: Topic.PlatformZPEHowManyWithCondition
      value: How many **[table name]** are **[insert condition]**?

    - kind: SetTextVariable
      id: setTextVariable_yZ9aB0
      variable: Topic.PlatformZPEWhatAreMy
      value: What are my **[table name]**?

    - kind: SetTextVariable
      id: setTextVariable_Io9bC2
      variable: Topic.PlatformZPETablesCreated
      value: What are the **[table name]** I created in the last week?

    - kind: SetTextVariable
      id: setTextVariable_eF5gH6
      variable: Topic.PlatformZPEWhoIsAssigned
      value: Who is **[record name]** assigned to?

    - kind: SetTextVariable
      id: setTextVariable_5SJyoX
      variable: Topic.PlatformZPEWhoIsAssignedWithPersonName
      value: What are the **[table name]** assigned to **[person]**?

    - kind: SetTextVariable
      id: setTextVariable_idomBQ
      variable: Topic.PlatformZPENavigateTo
      value: Navigate to **[table name]**

      id: setTextVariable_37E1vC

      value: Who are my contacts?

      id: setTextVariable_Uas3OS

    - kind: SetTextVariable

      variable: Topic.CollapsedFooterMessage
      value: "You can ask questions about this table and its records:"

    - kind: SetTextVariable
      id: setTextVariable_sT5uV6
      variable: Topic.Analyze
      value: Analyze

    - kind: SetTextVariable
      id: setTextVariable_wX7yZ8
      variable: Topic.Act
      value: Act

    - kind: SetTextVariable
      id: setTextVariable_F1eG2
      variable: Topic.Ask
      value: Ask

    - kind: SetTextVariable
      id: setTextVariable_BqXH5F
      variable: Topic.ShowMore
      value: Show more

    - kind: SetTextVariable
      id: setTextVariable_VEZrkd
      variable: Topic.ShowLess
      value: Show less

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_eHullO
      variable: Topic.AnalyzeIcon
      value: "=\"data:image/svg+xml;base64,\""

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_mPNMN2
      variable: Topic.ActIcon
      value: "=\"data:image/svg+xml;base64,\""

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_U34tGk
      variable: Topic.AskIcon
      value: "=\"data:image/svg+xml;base64,\""

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_eDW3Uk

      value: =CountRows(Global.PA_Copilot_EntityContext)

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_hXLzRG
      variable: Topic.IsFooterExpanded
      value: true

    - kind: Foreach
      id: foreach_pWlPiM
      items: =Global.PA_Copilot_EntityContext
      value: init:Topic.LoopValue1
      index: init:Topic.LoopIndex1
      actions:
        - kind: SetVariable
          id: setVariable_xdw35D
          variable: Topic.FooterMessage
          value: =If(Topic.LoopIndex1 = 0, Concatenate(Topic.FooterMessage, " ", Topic.LoopValue1.DisplayName), If(Not(IsBlank(Topic.LoopValue1.DisplayName)), Concatenate(Topic.FooterMessage, ", ", Topic.LoopValue1.DisplayName), Topic.FooterMessage))
      
    - kind: ConditionGroup
      id: conditionGroup_DFqvtE
      conditions:
        - id: conditionItem_12dzB2
          condition: =Topic.EntitiesInAppLength > 7
          actions:
            - kind: SetVariable
              id: setVariable_PV1Hub
              variable: Topic.IsFooterExpanded
              value: false

              index: init:Topic.LoopIndex2

    - kind: SetVariable

                        2, {sparkType: "PromptText", optionGroup: Topic.Ask, prompt:  Topic.PlatformZPEContactsWithoutEmailAddress},

data:
kind: AdaptiveDialog
beginDialog:
  kind: OnEventActivity
  id: main
  priority: 1
  eventName: Microsoft.PowerApps.Copilot.KnowledgeSourcesEvent
  actions:
    - kind: ParseValue
      id: SIrogC
      variable: Topic.UserQuestion
      valueType: String
      value: =System.Activity.Value.UserQuestion

    - kind: ParseValue
      id: ZbEO3u
      variable: Topic.Version
      valueType: String
      value: =System.Activity.Value.Version

    - kind: ConditionGroup
      id: conditionGroup_Dd6vAZ
      conditions:
        - id: conditionItem_9YYmwc
          condition: =Topic.Version = "1.1"
          actions:
            - kind: SearchAndSummarizeContent
              id: SearchAndSummarize_FullResponse
              userInput: =Topic.UserQuestion
              autoSend: false
              variable: Topic.Answer
              moderationLevel: Maximum
              applyModelKnowledgeSetting: false
              responseCaptureType: FullResponse

            - kind: ConditionGroup
              id: conditionGroup_AnswerResponse
              conditions:
                - id: conditionItem_AnswerNotBlank
                  condition: =!IsBlank(Topic.Answer)
                  actions:
                    - kind: SetVariable
                      id: setVariable_hf42k1
                      variable: Topic.AdaptiveCardActions
                      value: =[]

                    - kind: Foreach
                      id: foreach_b90FMh
                      items: =Topic.Answer.Text.CitationSources
                      value: init:Topic.CitationValue
                      index: init:Topic.CitationIndex
                      actions:
                        - kind: SetVariable
                          id: setVariable_K3QHL8
                          variable: Topic.ActionTitle
                          value: =If(!IsBlank(Topic.CitationValue.Id), Concatenate("[", Topic.CitationValue.Id, "] ", Topic.CitationValue.Name), Topic.CitationValue.Name)

                        - kind: EditTableV2
                          id: editTableV2_DS4xM0
                          itemsVariable: Topic.AdaptiveCardActions
                          changeType:
                            kind: AddItemOperation
                            value: "=If(IsBlank(Topic.CitationValue.Url), {type:\"Action.Submit\", title: Topic.ActionTitle, tooltip: Topic.CitationValue.Name, role: \"Button\", data: {sparkType: \"ClientEvent\", scenario: \"OpenDialog\", value: {text: Topic.CitationValue.Text, title: Topic.CitationValue.Name}}}, {type:\"Action.OpenUrl\", title: Topic.ActionTitle, tooltip: Topic.CitationValue.Name, role: \"Button\", url: Topic.CitationValue.Url})"

                    - kind: SendActivity
                      id: sendActivity_b0BLtR
                      activity:
                        attachments:
                          - kind: AdaptiveCardTemplate
                            cardContent: |-
                              ={
                                type: "AdaptiveCard",
                                body: [
                                  {
                                    type: "TextBlock",
                                    text: Topic.Answer.Text.Content,
                                    wrap: true
                                  },
                                  {
                                    type: "ActionSet",
                                    actions: Topic.AdaptiveCardActions
                                  }
                                ],
                                '$schema': "http://adaptivecards.io/schemas/adaptive-card.json",
                                version: "1.6"
                              }

              elseActions:
                - kind: SendActivity
                  id: sendActivity_Apology
                  activity:
                    kind: EventActivity
                    value: "=\"{\"\"ApologySource\"\": \"\"KnowledgeSources\"\", \"\"ApologyReason\"\": \"\"Data Sources did not return an answer.\"\"}\""
                    name: MS.PA.Apology

      elseActions:
        - kind: SearchAndSummarizeContent
          id: SearchAndSummarize_TextOnlyResponse
          userInput: =Topic.UserQuestion
          variable: Topic.AnswerText
          moderationLevel: Maximum
          applyModelKnowledgeSetting: false

        - kind: ConditionGroup
          id: conditionGroup_AnswerTextResponse
          conditions:
            - id: conditionItem_AnswerTextNotBlank
              condition: =!IsBlank(Topic.AnswerText)
              actions:
                - kind: EndDialog
                  id: lfhFEI
                  clearTopicQueue: true

description: This system topic triggers when the bot encounters an error. When using the test chat pane, the full error description is displayed.
data:
kind: AdaptiveDialog
beginDialog:
  kind: OnError
  id: main
  actions:
    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_timestamp
      variable: init:Topic.CurrentTime
      value: =Text(Now(), DateTimeFormat.UTC)

    - kind: ConditionGroup
      id: condition_1
      conditions:
        - id: bL4wmY
          condition: =System.Conversation.InTestMode = true
          actions:
            - kind: SendActivity
              id: sendMessage_XJBYMo
              activity: |-
                Error Message: {System.Error.Message}
                Error Code: {System.Error.Code}
                Conversation Id: {System.Conversation.Id}
                Time (UTC): {Topic.CurrentTime}

      elseActions:
        - kind: SendActivity
          id: sendActivity_LZpJok
          activity:
            kind: EventActivity
            value: "=Concatenate(\"{\"\"ErrorMessage\"\": \"\"\", System.Error.Message, \"\"\", \"\"ErrorCode\"\": \"\"\", System.Error.Code, \"\"\", \"\"ConversationId\"\": \"\"\", System.Conversation.Id, \"\"\", \"\"UTCTime\"\": \"\"\", Topic.CurrentTime, \"\"\"}\")"
            name: MS.PA.PVAError

    - kind: LogCustomTelemetryEvent
      id: 9KwEAn
      eventName: OnErrorLog
      properties: "={ErrorMessage: System.Error.Message, ErrorCode: System.Error.Code, TimeUTC: Topic.CurrentTime, ConversationId: System.Conversation.Id}"

    - kind: CancelAllDialogs
      id: NW7NyY
name: On Error

data:
kind: AdaptiveDialog
beginDialog:
  kind: OnEventActivity
  id: main
  priority: 9999
  eventName: Microsoft.PowerApps.Copilot.RequestSparks
  actions:
    - kind: BeginDialog
      id: Soun6H
      input:
        binding:
          FeatureSetting: EnableCopilotPromptPicker

      dialog: msdyn_appCopilot.topic.AppCopilotGetFeatureSetting
      output:
        binding:
          FeatureValue: Topic.FeatureValue

    - kind: ConditionGroup
      id: conditionGroup_3LXuJg
      conditions:
        - id: conditionItem_EJuABh
          condition: =Topic.FeatureValue = true
          actions:
            - kind: SetTextVariable
              id: setTextVariable_zYoM08
              variable: Topic.Act
              value: Act

            - kind: SetTextVariable
              id: setTextVariable_9BuDTP
              variable: Topic.Analyze
              value: Analyze

            - kind: SetTextVariable
              id: setTextVariable_EkrPi4
              variable: Topic.Ask
              value: Ask

            - kind: SetTextVariable
              id: setTextVariable_xa3sQu
              variable: Topic.NavigateToTableName
              value: Navigate to [table name]

            - kind: SetTextVariable
              id: setTextVariable_hxAu6L
              variable: Topic.HowManyTableNameAreThere
              value: How many [table name] are there?

            - kind: SetTextVariable
              id: setTextVariable_Bw9lQz
              variable: Topic.HowManyTableNameAreInsertCondition
              value: How many [table name] are [insert condition]?

            - kind: SetTextVariable
              id: setTextVariable_fbkHRn
              variable: Topic.WhatAreTheTableNameICreatedInTheLastWeek
              value: What are the [table name] I created in the last week?

            - kind: SetTextVariable
              id: setTextVariable_eFjQXY
              variable: Topic.WhoIsRecordNameAssignedTo
              value: Who is [record name] assigned to?

            - kind: SetTextVariable
              id: setTextVariable_IIRGvt
              variable: Topic.WhatAreTheTableNameAssignedToPerson
              value: What are the [table name] assigned to [person]?

            - kind: SetTextVariable
              id: setTextVariable_FWjnVw
              variable: Topic.WhatAreMyTableName
              value: What are my [table name]?

            - kind: SetTextVariable
              id: setTextVariable_qwKkPs
              variable: Topic.WhoAreMyContacts
              value: Who are my contacts?

            - kind: SetTextVariable
              id: setTextVariable_BBCLi0
              variable: Topic.WhichContactsDoNotHaveEmailsAddresses
              value: Which contacts do not have emails addresses?

            - kind: SetTextVariable
              id: setTextVariable_A2gsy5
              variable: Topic.WhichContactsDoNotHaveBusinessPhoneNumbers
              value: Which contacts do not have business phone numbers?

            - kind: SetTextVariable
              id: setTextVariable_3saXSn
              variable: Topic.WhichOpportunitiesClosedInThePast30Days
              value: Which opportunities closed in the past 30 days?

            - kind: SetTextVariable
              id: setTextVariable_b2NE88
              variable: Topic.WhatOpportunitiesHaveTheHighestEstimatedRevenue
              value: What opportunities have the highest estimated revenue?

            - kind: SetTextVariable
              id: setTextVariable_4wQDfG
              variable: Topic.WhatAreMyOpenOpportunities
              value: What are my open opportunities?

            - kind: SetTextVariable
              id: setTextVariable_ugohCY
              variable: Topic.WhatLeadsHaveClosedInTheLast30Days
              value: What leads have closed in the last 30 days?

            - kind: SetTextVariable
              id: setTextVariable_g1WVnq
              variable: Topic.WhatAreMyOpenLeads
              value: What are my open leads?

            - kind: SetTextVariable
              id: setTextVariable_XAsvzk
              variable: Topic.WhatAreTheTop10AccountsWithTheHighestRevenue
              value: What are the top 10 accounts with the highest revenue?

            - kind: SetTextVariable
              id: setTextVariable_tMqHg9
              variable: Topic.GetLatestNewsForAccountAdventureWorks
              value: Get latest news for account adventure works

            - kind: SetTextVariable
              id: setTextVariable_ogSkT5
              variable: Topic.WhatAccountsDoNotHaveAContact
              value: What accounts do not have a contact?

            - kind: SetVariable
              id: setVariable_3WTE3F
              variable: Topic.SparksArray
              value: |
                =[
                  {
                    entityName: "",
                    displayName: ""&Topic.Act&"",
                    displaySubtitle: ""&Topic.Act&"",
                    iconName: "CursorHover20Regular",
                    sparks: [
                      { displayName: ""&Topic.NavigateToTableName&"", type: "PromptText" }
                    ]
                  },
                  {
                    entityName: "",
                    displayName: ""&Topic.Analyze&"",
                    displaySubtitle: ""&Topic.Analyze&"",
                    iconName: "ClipboardDataBar20Regular",
                    sparks: [
                      { displayName: ""&Topic.HowManyTableNameAreThere&"", type: "PromptText" },
                      { displayName: ""&Topic.HowManyTableNameAreInsertCondition&"", type: "PromptText" },
                      { displayName: ""&Topic.WhatAreTheTableNameICreatedInTheLastWeek&"", type: "PromptText" },
                      { displayName: ""&Topic.WhoIsRecordNameAssignedTo&"", type: "PromptText" },
                      { displayName: ""&Topic.WhatAreTheTableNameAssignedToPerson&"", type: "PromptText" }
                    ]
                  },
                  {
                    entityName: "",
                    displayName: ""&Topic.Ask&"",
                    displaySubtitle: ""&Topic.Ask&"",
                    iconName: "ChatBubblesQuestion20Regular",
                    sparks: [
                      { displayName: ""&Topic.WhatAreMyTableName&"", type: "PromptText" }
                    ]
                  },
                  {
                    entityName: "contact",
                    displayName: ""&Topic.Ask&"",
                    displaySubtitle: ""&Topic.Ask&"",
                    iconName: "ChatBubblesQuestion20Regular",
                    sparks: [
                      { displayName: ""&Topic.WhoAreMyContacts&"", type: "PromptText" },
                      { displayName: ""&Topic.WhichContactsDoNotHaveEmailsAddresses&"", type: "PromptText" },
                      { displayName: ""&Topic.WhichContactsDoNotHaveBusinessPhoneNumbers&"", type: "PromptText" }
                    ]
                  },
                  {
                    entityName: "opportunity",
                    displayName: ""&Topic.Analyze&"",
                    displaySubtitle: ""&Topic.Analyze&"",
                    iconName: "ClipboardDataBar20Regular",
                    sparks: [
                      { displayName: ""&Topic.WhichOpportunitiesClosedInThePast30Days&"", type: "PromptText" },
                      { displayName: ""&Topic.WhatOpportunitiesHaveTheHighestEstimatedRevenue&"", type: "PromptText" }
                    ]
                  },
                  {
                    entityName: "opportunity",
                    displayName: ""&Topic.Ask&"",
                    displaySubtitle: ""&Topic.Ask&"",
                    iconName: "ChatBubblesQuestion20Regular",
                    sparks: [
                      { displayName: ""&Topic.WhatAreMyOpenOpportunities&"", type: "PromptText" }
                    ]
                  },
                  {
                    entityName: "lead",
                    displayName: ""&Topic.Analyze&"",
                    displaySubtitle: ""&Topic.Analyze&"",
                    iconName: "ClipboardDataBar20Regular",
                    sparks: [
                      { displayName: ""&Topic.WhatLeadsHaveClosedInTheLast30Days&"", type: "PromptText" }
                    ]
                  },
                  {
                    entityName: "lead",
                    displayName: ""&Topic.Ask&"",
                    displaySubtitle: ""&Topic.Ask&"",
                    iconName: "ChatBubblesQuestion20Regular",
                    sparks: [
                      { displayName: ""&Topic.WhatAreMyOpenLeads&"", type: "PromptText" }
                    ]
                  },
                  {
                    entityName: "account",
                    displayName: ""&Topic.Analyze&"",
                    displaySubtitle: ""&Topic.Analyze&"",
                    iconName: "ClipboardDataBar20Regular",
                    sparks: [
                      { displayName: ""&Topic.WhatAreTheTop10AccountsWithTheHighestRevenue&"", type: "PromptText" },
                      { displayName: ""&Topic.GetLatestNewsForAccountAdventureWorks&"", type: "PromptText" }
                    ]
                  },
                  {
                    entityName: "account",
                    displayName: ""&Topic.Ask&"",
                    displaySubtitle: ""&Topic.Ask&"",
                    iconName: "ChatBubblesQuestion20Regular",
                    sparks: [
                      { displayName: ""&Topic.WhatAccountsDoNotHaveAContact&"", type: "PromptText" }
                    ]
                  }
                ]

            - kind: SetVariable
              id: setVariable_d6e756
              variable: Topic.SparkGroups
              value: =ForAll(Filter(Topic.SparksArray, IsBlank(ThisRecord.entityName) || (!IsBlank(Global.PA_Copilot_EntityContext) && ThisRecord.entityName in DropColumns(Global.PA_Copilot_EntityContext, DisplayName, Description, EntityDisplayName))), ThisRecord)

      elseActions:
        - kind: ParseValue
          id: sM90HR
          variable: Topic.SparkGroups
          valueType:
            kind: Table
            properties:
              displayName: String
              displaySubtitle: String
              iconName: String
              sparks:
                type:
                  kind: Table
                  properties:
                    displayName: String
                    eventName: String
                    iconName: String
                    payload: String
                    type: String

          value: [ ]

    - kind: ParseValue
      id: PhkZWA
      variable: Topic.Sparks
      valueType:
        kind: Table
        properties:
          displayName: String
          eventName: String
          iconName: String
          payload: String
          type: String

      value: [ ]

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_13wNrb
      variable: Global.PA_Copilot_Sparks.sparkGroups
      value: "=With({groups: CountRows(Global.PA_Copilot_Sparks.sparkGroups)}, ForAll(Sequence(groups + CountRows(Topic.SparkGroups)), If(Value <= groups, Index(Global.PA_Copilot_Sparks.sparkGroups, Value), Index(Topic.SparkGroups, Value - groups))))"

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_C2KhQH
      variable: Global.PA_Copilot_Sparks.sparks
      value: "=With({groups: CountRows(Global.PA_Copilot_Sparks.sparks)}, ForAll(Sequence(groups + CountRows(Topic.Sparks)), If(Value <= groups, Index(Global.PA_Copilot_Sparks.sparks, Value), Index(Topic.Sparks, Value - groups))))"
name: Sparks Default Platform Content

description: Triggered on Event received (Microsoft.PowerApps.Copilot.SetModelAppUniqueNameContext) to process the SessionContext
data:
kind: AdaptiveDialog
beginDialog:
  kind: OnEventActivity
  id: main
  eventName: Microsoft.PowerApps.Copilot.SetModelAppUniqueNameContext
  actions:
    - kind: ParseValue
      id: slMr2F
      variable: Global.PA_Copilot_Model_SessionContext_Version
      valueType: String
      value: =If(!IsBlank(System.Activity.ChannelData.SetModelAppUniqueNameContext_Version), Text(System.Activity.ChannelData.SetModelAppUniqueNameContext_Version), "-1")

    - kind: ParseValue
      id: r6ZsTS
      variable: Global.PA_Copilot_Model_SessionContext
      valueType:
        kind: Record
        properties:
          appId: String
          appUniqueName: String
          generativeAnswersSettings:
            type:
              kind: Record
              properties:
                bing_configuration_id: String
                public_websites:
                  type:
                    kind: Table
                    properties:
                      Value: String

                search_context: String
                search_type: String

          hostMode: String
          url: String
          userLocaleId: Number
          userId: String

      value: =If(!IsBlank(System.Activity.ChannelData.SetModelAppUniqueNameContext), System.Activity.ChannelData.SetModelAppUniqueNameContext, System.Activity.Value)

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_7jxtSE
      variable: System.User.Language
      value: |-
        =Switch(Global.PA_Copilot_Model_SessionContext.userLocaleId,
          1033, Locale.English,
          1030, Locale.Danish,
          1043, Locale.Dutch,
          1036, Locale.French,
          1031, Locale.German,
          1040, Locale.Italian,
          1041, Locale.Japanese,
          1046, Locale.Portuguese_Brazilian,
          1034, Locale.Spanish,
          2052, Locale.Chinese_Simplified,
          1029, Locale.Czech,
          1035, Locale.Finnish,
          1032, Locale.Greek,
          1042, Locale.Korean,
          1044, Locale.Norwegian,
          1045, Locale.Polish,
          1049, Locale.Russian,
          1053, Locale.Swedish,
          1054, Locale.Thai,
          1055, Locale.Turkish,
          3082, Locale.Spanish,
          1025, Locale.Arabic,
          1037, Locale.Hebrew,
          Locale.English

data:
kind: AdaptiveDialog
beginDialog:
  kind: OnEventActivity
  id: main
  eventName: Microsoft.PowerApps.Copilot.SetModelPageContext
  actions:
    - kind: ParseValue
      id: QEQNIF
      variable: Global.PA__Copilot_Model_PageContext_Version
      valueType: String
      value: =If(!IsBlank(System.Activity.ChannelData.SetModelPageContext_Version), Text(System.Activity.ChannelData.SetModelPageContext_Version), "-1")

    - kind: ParseValue
      id: r6ZsTS
      variable: Topic.PageInput
      valueType:
        kind: Record
        properties:
          pageInput:
            type:
              kind: Record
              properties:
                entityTypeName: String
                id:
                  type:
                    kind: Record
                    properties:
                      guid: String

                pageName: String
                pageType: String
                queryStringParameters: String
                viewId:
                  type:
                    kind: Record
                    properties:
                      guid: String

                viewType: Number

      value: =If(!IsBlank(System.Activity.ChannelData.SetModelPageContext), System.Activity.ChannelData.SetModelPageContext, System.Activity.Value)

    - kind: ParseValue
      id: t4YsPS
      variable: Topic.PageContext
      valueType:
        kind: Record
        properties:
          pageContext:
            type:
              kind: Record
              properties:
                entityTypeName: String
                id:
                  type:
                    kind: Record
                    properties:
                      guid: String

                pageName: String
                pageType: String
                viewId:
                  type:
                    kind: Record
                    properties:
                      guid: String

                viewType: Number

      value: =If(!IsBlank(System.Activity.ChannelData.SetModelPageContext), System.Activity.ChannelData.SetModelPageContext, System.Activity.Value)

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_a3F2Es
      variable: Global.PA__Copilot_Model_PageContext
      value: =If(!IsBlank(Topic.PageInput.pageInput),{'pageContext':Topic.PageInput.pageInput}, Topic.PageContext)
name: Model App Page Context - Event Trigger

data:
kind: AdaptiveDialog
beginDialog:
  kind: OnRecognizedIntent
  id: main
  intent:
    displayName: Questions about my data

  actions:
    - kind: BeginDialog
      id: 1PSkgv
      input:
        binding:
          FeatureSetting: DVRecordContext

      dialog: msdyn_appCopilot.topic.AppCopilotGetFeatureSetting
      output:
        binding:
          FeatureValue: Topic.FeatureValue

    - kind: ConditionGroup
      id: conditionGroup_OIQZyC
      conditions:
        - id: conditionItem_hqGuSq
          condition: =Topic.FeatureValue = true
          actions:
            - kind: SetVariable
              id: setVariable_mxgnFc
              variable: Topic.DVContent
              value: |-
                ={
                    Prompt: System.Activity.Text,
                    RecordContext: Global.PA_Copilot_DVRecordContext,
                    TableContext: Global.PA_Copilot_DVTableContext
                }

            - kind: SendActivity
              id: sendActivity_bOpmCB
              activity:
                kind: EventActivity
                value: =Topic.DVContent
                name: MS.PA.DVCopilot

      elseActions:
        - kind: SendActivity
          id: sendActivity_Y9ESLB
          activity:
            kind: EventActivity
            value: =System.Activity.Text
            name: MS.PA.DVCopilot
name: Dataverse Structured Data Question and Answer

description: Triggered on Event received (Microsoft.PowerApps.Copilot.SetModelNavigationContext) to process the Page Context
data:
kind: AdaptiveDialog
beginDialog:
  kind: OnEventActivity
  id: main
  eventName: Microsoft.PowerApps.Copilot.SetModelNavigationContext
  actions:
    - kind: ParseValue
      id: SQschT
      variable: Global.PA_Copilot_Model_NavigationContext_Version
      valueType: String
      value: =If(!IsBlank(System.Activity.ChannelData.SetModelNavigationContext_Version), Text(System.Activity.ChannelData.SetModelNavigationContext_version), "-1")

    - kind: ParseValue
      id: 7X4OgD
      variable: Topic.NavContext
      valueType:
        kind: Record
        properties:
          siteMapEntries:
            type:
              kind: Table
              properties:
                Description: String
                DisplayName: String
                TargetEntity: String
                EntityDisplayName: String

      value: =If(!IsBlank(System.Activity.ChannelData.SetModelNavigationContext), System.Activity.ChannelData.SetModelNavigationContext, System.Activity.Value)

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_sZZ7sj
      variable: Global.PA_Copilot_Model_NavigationContext
      value: =Topic.NavContext.siteMapEntries

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_BTVHKS
      variable: Global.PA_Copilot_EntityContext
      value: =Topic.NavContext.siteMapEntries
name: Model App Entity Context - Event Trigger

kind: AdaptiveDialog

  actions:
    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_3JmZE8
      variable: Topic.nlPrompt
      value: =Text(System.Activity.Value.nlPrompt)

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_3tXGx4
      variable: Topic.appId
      value: =Text(System.Activity.Value.appId)

    - kind: LogCustomTelemetryEvent
      id: GGn82P
      eventName: Log AppId
      properties: =Topic.appId

    - kind: ConditionGroup
      id: conditionGroup_SEp2Dt
      conditions:
        - id: conditionItem_yfUzmJ
          condition: =IsBlank(Topic.nlPrompt)
          actions:
            - kind: SendActivity
              id: sendActivity_FT0aIx
              activity:
                kind: EventActivity
                value: "=ParseJSON(\"{\"\"error\"\": \"\"Blank_Prompt\"\"}\")"
                name: MS.PA.DatasetSearch

            - kind: EndDialog
              id: gMH4wb

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_GFvpsy
      variable: Topic.requestBody
      value: "=Concatenate(\"{\"\"queryText\"\": \"\"\",Topic.nlPrompt, \"\"\", \"\"options\"\": [\"\"GetResultsSummary\"\",\"\"GenerateFetchXML\"\"]}\")"

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_v6XCEt
      variable: Topic.userAgent
      value: =Global.PA_Copilot_SessionContext.host

    - kind: HttpRequestAction
      id: FfQL0b
      method: Post
      url: https://dataverse/api/copilot/v1.0/QueryStructuredData
      headers:
        x-ms-app-id: =Topic.appId
        x-ms-user-agent: =Topic.userAgent

      body:
        kind: RawRequestContent
        contentType: application/json
        content: =Topic.requestBody

      errorHandling:
        kind: ContinueOnErrorBehavior
        statusCode: Topic.statusCode
        errorResponseBody: Topic.callError

      response: Topic.Response
      responseSchema: Any

    - kind: LogCustomTelemetryEvent
      id: g9Ic7C
      eventName: Log StatusCode
      properties: =Topic.statusCode

    - kind: SendActivity
      id: sendActivity_xITQ9N
      activity:
        kind: EventActivity
        value: =Topic.Response
        name: MS.PA.DatasetSearch

data:
kind: AdaptiveDialog
beginDialog:
  kind: OnRedirect
  id: main
  actions:
    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_Kwd4HF
      variable: Topic.HasFeatureSettings
      value: =Not(IsBlank(Global.PA_Copilot_FeatureSettings))

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_a0peoE
      variable: Topic.TargetSetting
      value: |-
        =Filter(
            Global.PA_Copilot_FeatureSettings, 
            Trim(Lower(Name)) = Trim(Lower(Topic.FeatureSetting))
        )

    - kind: ConditionGroup
      id: conditionGroup_CFChd0
      conditions:
        - id: conditionItem_buK6xk
          condition: =Topic.HasFeatureSettings && Not(IsBlank(Topic.TargetSetting)) && CountRows(Topic.TargetSetting) = 1
          actions:
            - kind: SetVariable
              id: setVariable_EKRw3W
              variable: Topic.FeatureValue
              value: =First(Topic.TargetSetting).Value

      elseActions:
        - kind: ConditionGroup
          id: conditionGroup_j5651f
          conditions:
            - id: conditionItem_k8DG1C
              condition: =!IsBlank(Topic.DefaultSettingValue)
              actions:
                - kind: SetVariable
                  id: setVariable_plwkmp
                  variable: Topic.FeatureValue
                  value: =Topic.DefaultSettingValue

          elseActions:
            - kind: SetVariable
              id: setVariable_eZQSme
              variable: Topic.FeatureValue
              value: false

inputType:
  properties:
    DefaultSettingValue:
      displayName: DefaultSettingValue
      description: Default value true or false
      type: Boolean

    FeatureSetting:
      displayName: FeatureSetting
      type: String

outputType:
  properties:
    FeatureValue:
      displayName: FeatureValue
      description: Feature setting value
      type: Boolean
name: AppCopilot.GetFeatureSetting

data:
kind: AdaptiveDialog
beginDialog:
  kind: OnEventActivity
  id: main
  eventName: Microsoft.PowerApps.Copilot.RecordSummaryCard
  actions:
    - kind: ParseValue
      id: NJNh97
      variable: Topic.EntityLogicalName
      valueType: String
      value: =System.Activity.Value.entityLogicalName

    - kind: ParseValue
      id: akbvjB
      variable: Topic.EntityId
      valueType: String
      value: =System.Activity.Value.id

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_uzSdnM
      variable: Topic.DataverseInfo
      value: |-
        ={
            host: "https://dataverse",
            apiPath: "/api/data/v9.2",
            correlationId: If(!IsBlank(System.Activity.ChannelData.correlationId),
                Text(System.Activity.ChannelData.correlationId),
                Text(GUID())),
            clientRequestId: If(!IsBlank(System.Activity.ChannelData.clientRequestId),
                Text(System.Activity.ChannelData.clientRequestId),
                Text(GUID())),
            clientSessionId: If(!IsBlank(System.Activity.ChannelData.clientSessionId),
                Text(System.Activity.ChannelData.clientSessionId),
                Text(GUID()))
        }

    - kind: HttpRequestAction
      id: F6TO8K
      method: Post
      url: |-
        =Concatenate(
            Topic.DataverseInfo.host,
            Topic.DataverseInfo.apiPath,
            "/AISummarizeRecord")
      headers:
        X-Ms-Client-Request-Id: =Topic.DataverseInfo.clientRequestId
        X-Ms-Client-Session-Id: =Topic.DataverseInfo.clientSessionId
        X-Ms-Correlation-Id: =Topic.DataverseInfo.correlationId

      body:
        kind: JsonRequestContent
        content: |-
          ={
              EntityLogicalName: Topic.EntityLogicalName,
              Id: Topic.EntityId,
              IsMergedCatchupAndSummary: false
          }

      response: Topic.AISummarizeRecordResponse
      responseSchema: Any

    - kind: SendActivity
      id: sendActivity_asdfas
      activity:
        kind: EventActivity
        value: |-
          ={
            controlName: "SummaryCard",
            dataBinding: {
              summary: Concatenate(Topic.AISummarizeRecordResponse.   SummarizedText),
              title: "Summary by Copilot",
              actionButtons:[
                {
                  actionOnClick: "{""type"":""OpenCopilotPane"", ""properties"":{""input"":""sumarize this""}}",
                  label: "See more"
                },
                {
                  actionOnClick: "{""type"":""Copy"",""properties"":{""contentName"":""summary text""}}",
                  label: "Copy"
                }
              ]
            },
            error: ""
          }
        name: MS.PA.RecordSummaryCard
name: Record Summary Card

beginDialog:

  id: main
  priority: 0
  eventName: Microsoft.PowerApps.Copilot.CopilotFeatures
  actions:
    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_sojWk4
      variable: Global.PA_Copilot_Custom_Version
      value: "\"\""

    - kind: ParseValue
      id: vQy4c0
      variable: Global.PA_Copilot_Features
      valueType:
        kind: Record
        properties:
          CustomBotVersion: String
          Features:
            type:
              kind: Table
              properties:
                Name: String
                Value: String

          PlatformVersion: String

      value: "\"\""

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_v3nYsC
      variable: Global.PA_Copilot_Features
      value: |-
        ={
          PlatformVersion: "1.0.91",
          CustomBotVersion: Global.PA_Copilot_Custom_Version,
          Features: [
            { Name: "AdvancedContext" , Value: "false"},
            { Name: "Microsoft.PowerApps.Copilot.CIJAppContext" , Value: "ChannelData" },
            { Name: "Microsoft.PowerApps.Copilot.DVRecordContext" , Value: "ChannelData" },
            { Name: "Microsoft.PowerApps.Copilot.DVTableContext" , Value: "ChannelData" },
            { Name: "Microsoft.PowerApps.Copilot.FeatureContextProvider" , Value: "ChannelData" },
            { Name: "Microsoft.PowerApps.Copilot.SetModelAppUniqueNameContext" , Value: "ChannelData" },
            { Name: "Microsoft.PowerApps.Copilot.SetModelNavigationContext" , Value: "ChannelData" },
            { Name: "Microsoft.PowerApps.Copilot.SetModelPageContext" , Value: "ChannelData" },
            { Name: "Microsoft.PowerApps.Copilot.BPAReportContext", Value: "ChannelData"}
          ]
        }

data:
kind: AdaptiveDialog
beginDialog:
  kind: OnRecognizedIntent
  id: main
  intent: {}
  actions:
    - kind: BeginDialog
      id: Zao64N
      input:
        binding:
          DefaultSettingValue: false
          FeatureSetting: "=\"IsBingSearchEnabled\""

      dialog: msdyn_appCopilot.topic.AppCopilotGetFeatureSetting
      output:
        binding:
          FeatureValue: Topic.FeatureValue

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_57dD2a
      variable: Topic.UserQuestion
      value: =If(IsBlank(Topic.OutsideQuestion), System.Activity.Text, Topic.OutsideQuestion)

    - kind: ConditionGroup
      id: conditionGroup_oqFc43
      conditions:
        - id: conditionItem_Foe7l4
          condition: =!IsBlank(Global.PA_Copilot_Model_SessionContext.generativeAnswersSettings)
          actions:
            - kind: ConditionGroup
              id: conditionGroup_5nkeqX
              conditions:
                - id: conditionItem_icwZuP
                  condition: =Topic.FeatureValue = false
                  actions:
                    - kind: BeginDialog
                      id: p8Fx8g
                      dialog: msdyn_appCopilot.topic.BingSearchFallback

            - kind: ConditionGroup
              id: conditionGroup_ocBTyV
              conditions:
                - id: conditionItem_UafIzd
                  condition: =If(Global.PA_Copilot_Model_SessionContext.generativeAnswersSettings.search_type = "SearchWithBingIndex", true, false)
                  actions:
                    - kind: SearchAndSummarizeContent
                      id: searchAndSummarizeContent_LZFfGe
                      userInput: =If(!IsBlank(Global.PA_Copilot_Model_SessionContext.generativeAnswersSettings.search_context), Concatenate(Global.PA_Copilot_Model_SessionContext.generativeAnswersSettings.search_context,Topic.UserQuestion ), Topic.UserQuestion)
                      variable: Topic.Answer
                      publicDataSource:
                        kind: BingCustomSearchDataSource
                        customConfigurationId: =Global.PA_Copilot_Model_SessionContext.generativeAnswersSettings.bing_configuration_id

                      sharePointSearchDataSource: {}
                      customDataSource: {}

                    - kind: ConditionGroup
                      id: conditionGroup_w0iTf7
                      conditions:
                        - id: conditionItem_ZccR1D
                          condition: =!IsBlank(Topic.Answer)
                          actions:
                            - kind: CancelAllDialogs
                              id: arFnKl

                      elseActions:
                        - kind: SendActivity
                          id: sendActivity_Z7Gnz1
                          activity:
                            kind: EventActivity
                            value: "=\"{\"\"ApologySource\"\": \"\"GenerativeAnswers\"\", \"\"ApologyReason\"\": \"\"Data Sources did not return an answer.\"\"}\""
                            name: MS.PA.Apology

              elseActions:
                - kind: SearchAndSummarizeContent
                  id: searchAndSummarizeContent_zppqEg
                  userInput: =If(!IsBlank(Global.PA_Copilot_Model_SessionContext.generativeAnswersSettings.search_context), Concatenate(Topic.UserQuestion, Global.PA_Copilot_Model_SessionContext.generativeAnswersSettings.search_context), Topic.UserQuestion)
                  autoSend: true
                  variable: Topic.Answer
                  publicDataSource:
                    kind: PublicSiteSearchDataSource
                    sites: |-
                      =Filter(
                        Split(
                          If(!IsEmpty(Global.PA_Copilot_Model_SessionContext.generativeAnswersSettings.public_websites),
                            Concat(Global.PA_Copilot_Model_SessionContext.generativeAnswersSettings.public_websites, Value, "|"),
                            "") & 
                            "|" &
                            Text(System.Activity.ChannelData.answersUrl1) & 
                            "|" &
                            Text(System.Activity.ChannelData.answersUrl2)& 
                            "|" &
                            Text(System.Activity.ChannelData.answersUrl3)& 
                            "|" &
                            Text(System.Activity.ChannelData.answersUrl4),
                          "|"
                        ),
                        (Value <> "")
                      )

                  sharePointSearchDataSource: {}
                  customDataSource: {}

      elseActions:
        - kind: EndDialog
          id: OLb9xS

inputType:
  properties:
    OutsideQuestion:
      displayName: OutsideQuestion
      type: String
name: Generative Answers

data:
kind: AdaptiveDialog

data:
kind: AdaptiveDialog
beginDialog:
  kind: OnUnknownIntent
  id: main
  priority: -1
  actions:
    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_RMwJKo
      variable: Topic.MatchedEntities
      value: |+
        =Filter(
            Global.PA_Copilot_EntityContext, 
            Find(Lower(ThisRecord.DisplayName), Lower(System.Activity.Text)) > 0
        )

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_RMwJKo2
      variable: Topic.MatchedEntities2
      value: |+
        =Filter(
            Global.PA_Copilot_EntityContext, 
            Find(Lower(ThisRecord.TargetEntity), Lower(System.Activity.Text)) > 0
        )

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_BLZAgi
      variable: Topic.HasNoURLs
      value: =IsBlank(System.Activity.ChannelData.answersUrl1) && IsBlank(System.Activity.ChannelData.answersUrl2) && IsBlank(System.Activity.ChannelData.answersUrl3) && IsBlank(System.Activity.ChannelData.answersUrl4) && IsBlank(Global.PA_Copilot_Model_SessionContext.generativeAnswersSettings) && IsEmpty(Global.PA_Copilot_Model_SessionContext.generativeAnswersSettings.public_websites) && IsBlank(Global.PA_Copilot_Model_SessionContext.generativeAnswersSettings.bing_configuration_id)

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_TVhII
      variable: Topic.appsOptedOutOfDataQandA
      value: =(Global.PA_Copilot_Model_SessionContext.appUniqueName = "msdyncrm_MarketingSMBApp" && System.User.Language = Locale.English) || Global.PA_Copilot_Model_SessionContext.appUniqueName = "msdyn_BusinessPerformanceAnalytics" || Global.PA_Copilot_Model_SessionContext.appUniqueName = "msdyn_XPnAModeler"

    - kind: BeginDialog
      id: Pqr34B
      input:
        binding:
          DefaultSettingValue: false
          FeatureSetting: "=\"EnableGenerativeAnswersDVFallback\""

      dialog: msdyn_appCopilot.topic.AppCopilotGetFeatureSetting
      output:
        binding:
          FeatureValue: Topic.EnableGenerativeAnswersDVFallback

    - kind: BeginDialog
      id: Mno56C
      input:
        binding:
          DefaultSettingValue: false
          FeatureSetting: "=\"IsBingSearchEnabled\""

      dialog: msdyn_appCopilot.topic.AppCopilotGetFeatureSetting
      output:
        binding:
          FeatureValue: Topic.IsBingSearchEnabled

    - kind: ConditionGroup
      id: conditionGroup_TmQgBC
      conditions:
        - id: conditionItem_5Eho6B
          condition: =Topic.EnableGenerativeAnswersDVFallback = true && Topic.IsBingSearchEnabled = true && Topic.appsOptedOutOfDataQandA = false && If(IsBlank(Global.PA_Copilot_SessionContext) Or Global.PA_Copilot_SessionContext.host <> "Webplayer-SideCar", true, false)
          actions:
            - kind: BeginDialog
              id: 1E36zn
              dialog: msdyn_appCopilot.topic.DataverseStructuredData

            - kind: EndDialog
              id: 3JsLoG

    - kind: ConditionGroup
      id: conditionGroup_TM3TIy
      conditions:
        - id: conditionItem_ougi4g
          condition: =(CountRows(Topic.MatchedEntities) > 0 || CountRows(Topic.MatchedEntities2) > 0 || Topic.HasNoURLs) && !Topic.appsOptedOutOfDataQandA
          actions:
            - kind: ConditionGroup
              id: conditionGroup_x6XivR
              conditions:
                - id: conditionItem_NN3P8m
                  condition: =If(!IsBlank(Global.PA_Copilot_SessionContext) And Global.PA_Copilot_SessionContext.host = "Webplayer-SideCar", true, false)
                  actions:
                    - kind: BeginDialog
                      id: E5DnTd
                      dialog: msdyn_appCopilot.topic.DVQAndA

              elseActions:
                - kind: BeginDialog
                  id: nbCA9c
                  dialog: msdyn_appCopilot.topic.DataverseStructuredData

            - kind: EndDialog
              id: mq9xW4

      elseActions:
        - kind: BeginDialog
          id: 3yvJsp
          dialog: msdyn_appCopilot.topic.GenerativeAnswers

        - kind: SearchAndSummarizeContent
          id: search-content
          userInput: =System.Activity.Text
          moderationLevel: High
          variable: Topic.Answer
          publicDataSource:
            kind: PublicSiteSearchDataSource
            sites: |-
              =Filter(
                  [Text(System.Activity.ChannelData.answersUrl1), Text(System.Activity.ChannelData.answersUrl2), Text(System.Activity.ChannelData.answersUrl3), Text(System.Activity.ChannelData.answersUrl4)],
                  (Value <> "")
              )

          sharePointSearchDataSource: {}
          customDataSource: {}

        - kind: ConditionGroup
          id: has-answer-conditions
          conditions:
            - id: has-answer
              condition: =!IsBlank(Topic.Answer)
              actions:
                - kind: EndDialog
                  id: end-topic
                  clearTopicQueue: true
name: Platform conversational boosting

description: This system topic triggers when the bot matches multiple Topics with the incoming message and needs to clarify which one should be triggered.
data:
kind: AdaptiveDialog
beginDialog:
  kind: OnSelectIntent
  id: main
  actions:
    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_M6434i
      variable: init:Topic.IntentOptions
      value: =System.Recognizer.IntentOptions

    - kind: Question
      id: question_zf2HhP
      interruptionPolicy:
        allowInterruption: false

      alwaysPrompt: true
      variable: System.Recognizer.SelectedIntent
      prompt: "To clarify, did you mean:"
      entity:
        kind: DynamicClosedListEntity
        items: =Topic.IntentOptions

    - kind: SetTextVariable
      id: setTextVariable_4zODlu
      variable: Topic.NoTopic
      value: NoTopic

    - kind: ConditionGroup
      id: conditionGroup_60PuXb
      conditions:
        - id: conditionItem_rs7GgM
          condition: =System.Recognizer.SelectedIntent.TopicId = Topic.NoTopic
          actions:
            - kind: ReplaceDialog
              id: YZXRDb
              dialog: msdyn_appCopilot.topic.Fallback
name: Multiple Topics Matched

data:
kind: AdaptiveDialog
beginDialog:
  kind: OnRedirect
  id: main
  actions:
    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_3XFTlE
      variable: Topic.appId
      value: =Global.PA_Copilot_Model_SessionContext.appId

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_ypbI0m
      variable: Topic.userAgent
      value: =Global.PA_Copilot_SessionContext.host

    - kind: HttpRequestAction
      id: cq9KMX
      method: Get
      url: =Concatenate("https://dataverse/api/data/v9.1/RetrieveAadUserRoles(DirectoryObjectId=", System.User.Id, ")?$select=name")
      headers:
        x-ms-app-id: Topic.appId
        x-ms-user-agent: Topic.userAgent

      errorHandling:
        kind: ContinueOnErrorBehavior
        statusCode: Topic.callStatusCode
        errorResponseBody: Topic.callError

      response: Topic.DVResponse
      responseSchema:
        kind: Record
        properties:
          value:
            type:
              kind: Table
              properties:
                name: String
                roleid: String

    - kind: SetVariable
      id: setVariable_lnXMgT
      variable: Global.PA_Copilot_User_Roles
      value: =Topic.DVResponse.value
name: User Role Request - Dataverse API Request
